episodes.title: Green Kitchen: Maximizing Your Fridge and Freezer
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Environmental lifestyle expert Danny Seo offers simple tips for making your refrigerator and freezer efficient and eco-friendly.

episodes.title: Green Kitchen: Dishwashing Tips
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Environmental lifestyle expert Danny Seo explains why using the dishwasher is more eco-friendly than hand-washing and tells you what to look for when buying detergent.

episodes.title: Green Kitchen: Choosing and Cleaning Your Countertops
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Environmental lifestyle expert Danny Seo talks about eco-friendly kitchen countertops, and shows you an easy, green way to clean them..

episodes.title: Green Kitchen: Choosing paint
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Environmental lifestyle expert Danny Seo talks about eco-friendly paint.

episodes.title: Green Kitchen: Coffeemaker, Sponges, and Garbage Disposal
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Environmental lifestyle expert Danny Seo shares easy, eco-friendly ways to clean your coffeemaker, sponges, and garbage disposal.

episodes.title: How to Make a Blood and Sand Cocktail
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Mixologist Eben Freeman, of Tailor restaurant in New York City, demonstrates how to make a Blood and Sand cocktail combining whiskey, vermouth, brandy, and orange juice.

episodes.title: Bill Telepan's Mother's Day Picnic: Lemon Bars, Step 1
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Chef Bill Telepan and his daughter, Leah, cook up a tasty picnic for Mother's Day. In this video, they demonstrate how to make the crust for their colorful lemon–poppy seed bars.

episodes.title: Bill Telepan's Mother's Day Picnic: Lemon Bars, Step 2
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Chef Bill Telepan and his daughter, Leah, cook up a tasty picnic for Mother's Day. In this video, they demonstrate how to make the poppy seed layer for their colorful lemon–poppy seed bars.

episodes.title: Bill Telepan's Mother's Day Picnic: Lemon Bars, Step 3
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Chef Bill Telepan and his daughter, Leah, cook up a tasty picnic for Mother's Day. In this video, they demonstrate how to make the lemon curd for their colorful lemon–poppy seed bars.

episodes.title: Bill Telepan's Mother's Day Picnic: Lemon Bars, Step 4
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Chef Bill Telepan and his daughter, Leah, cook up a tasty picnic for Mother's Day. In this video, they demonstrate how to make the crust for their colorful lemon–poppy seed bars.

episodes.title: Bill Telepan's Mother's Day Picnic: Cucumber Soup
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Chef Bill Telepan and his daughter, Leah, cook up a tasty picnic for Mother's Day. In this video, they demonstrate how to make a chilled cucumber-dill soup.

episodes.title: Bill Telepan's Mother's Day Picnic: Fried Chicken
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Chef Bill Telepan and his daughter, Leah, cook up a tasty picnic for Mother's Day. In this video, they demonstrate how to make moist, crunchy fried chicken.

episodes.title: Govind Armstrong Interview
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Govind Armstrong, executive chef and partner of Table 8 in Los Angeles, South Beach, and New York, discusses his career as a chef, including catering his mother's parties when he was a preteen and working with the legendary Wolfgang Puck.

episodes.title: How to Make Sangria
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Mixologist Eben Freeman, of Tailor restaurant in New York City, demonstrates how to prepare Sangria.

episodes.title: How to Make a Pisco Sour Cocktail
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Mixologist Eben Freeman, of Tailor restaurant in New York City, demonstrates how to make a frothy Pisco Sour cocktail

episodes.title: How to Make a Pimm's Cup Cocktail
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: Mixologist Eben Freeman, of Tailor restaurant in New York City, demonstrates how to prepare a fruity Pimm's Cup cocktail, a British classic.

episodes.title: Buying Produce with Daniel Patterson
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: The chef at San Francisco's Coi gives a tour of the Marin farmers' market and shares his secrets for picking the best ingredients and planning a seasonal menu around them.

episodes.title: Daniel Patterson Butter-Making Demo
episodes.author: Epicurious.com
episodes.summary: The chef/owner of San Francisco's Coi shows how easy it is to make butter at home.
